Package com.example.group1hrmsapp.service

Interface BenefitService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BenefitServiceImpl
public interface BenefitService
Service interface for managing Benefit entities. Declares methods for standard CRUD operations and additional operations such as pagination and sorting.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createBenefit​(Benefit benefit)
    Creates and stores a new Benefit entry into the database.
    void deleteBenefitById​(java.lang.Long id)
    Deletes a Benefit from the database.
    boolean enrollInBenefit​(java.lang.Long benefitId)
    Enrolls an employee to a specific benefit using the benefit's ID.

    Retrieves a paginated list of benefits that meet the given specification criteria.

    Retrieves a paginated list of Benefits sorted by a specific field and direction.

  • Method Details

    • getAllBenefits

      java.util.List<Benefit> getAllBenefits()
      Retrieves all Benefit Objects.
      Returns:
      a list of Benefit Objects.

    • createBenefit

      void createBenefit​(Benefit benefit)
      Creates and stores a new Benefit entry into the database. Before adding the benefit, the method checks if the logged-in user has the necessary privileges to create a benefit by checking their special type. Only users with the special type "HR" are allowed to create new benefits.
      Parameters:
      benefit - The benefit object to be saved into the database.
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - If no user is currently logged in or if the logged-in user doesn't have the HR special type.

    • getBenefitById

      Benefit getBenefitById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Retrieves a Benefit by a specific ID number.
      Parameters:
      id - Long representing the Benefit in the database.
      Returns:
      an Benefit Object.

    • saveBenefit

      void saveBenefit​(Benefit benefit)
      Saves a Benefit to the database.
      Parameters:
      benefit - Benefit Object to be saved to the database.

    • updateBenefit

      void updateBenefit​(Benefit benefit)
      Updates an existing Benefit in the database.
      Parameters:
      benefit - Benefit Object to be updated in the database.

    • deleteBenefitById

      void deleteBenefitById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Deletes a Benefit from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - Long representing the Benefit in the database.

    • enrollInBenefit

      boolean enrollInBenefit​(java.lang.Long benefitId)
      Enrolls an employee to a specific benefit using the benefit's ID.
      Parameters:
      benefitId - The unique identifier of the benefit to enroll in.
      Returns:
      true if the enrollment was successful, false otherwise.

    • withdrawFromBenefit

      boolean withdrawFromBenefit​(java.lang.Long benefitId)
      Withdraws an employee from a specific benefit using the benefit's ID.
      Parameters:
      benefitId - The unique identifier of the benefit to withdraw from.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • findPaginated

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Benefit> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
      Retrieves a paginated list of Benefits sorted by a specific field and direction.
      Parameters:
      pageNo - The page number to retrieve, starting from 1.
      pageSize - The number of Benefits per page.
      sortField - The field by which to sort the Benefits.
      sortDirection - The direction to sort the Benefits. This should be 'ASC' for ascending order or 'DESC' for descending order.
      Returns:
      A Page of Benefits based on the given page number and size, sorted by the given field and direction.

    • findFilteredAndPaginated

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Benefit> findFilteredAndPaginated​(org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<Benefit> spec, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a paginated list of benefits that meet the given specification criteria.
      Parameters:
      spec - The specification criteria used to filter benefits.
      pageable - The pagination information including page size and sort order.
      Returns:
      A paginated list of benefits that meet the given specification criteria.

    • prepareSpecification

      org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<Benefit> prepareSpecification​(java.lang.String coverageType, java.lang.String benefitName, java.lang.Double cost, java.lang.String coverageProvider)
      Prepares a specification for filtering Benefit based on the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      coverageType - The type of coverage (e.g. HEALTH, DENTAL, VISION, etc.).
      benefitName - The name of the benefit.
      cost - The cost associated with the benefit.
      coverageProvider - The provider offering the coverage (e.g. AETNA, HUMANA, etc.).
      Returns:
      A specification that can be used to filter benefits based on the given criteria.

    • getLoggedInUser

      Employee getLoggedInUser()
      Retrieves the currently logged-in Employee.
      Returns:
      An Employee object representing the currently logged-in user.
